entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Churchill
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -35.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Churchill Airport 09:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -35.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -40.2°C
Wind: WNW 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Clearing. Blowing snow early this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 53 this morning and minus 47 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 47 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
